name: gcp-search
title: Google Cloud Platform Search
description: Browse GCP Products and open them in the browser in the Google Cloud Console, or view the documentation.
author: klaa97

preferences.name: skipSysPrefixedProjects
preferences.description: Enable this option to exclude Google Cloud projects that are automatically generated with a 'sys-' prefix whenever a new App Script project is created in Google Workspace.
preferences.label: Skip 'sys-' prefixed projects

commands.name: searchProjects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.subtitle: Google Cloud Platform
commands.description: Search projects in your Google Cloud Platform organization and browse the products in the Google Cloud Console.

commands.name: searchDocumentationProducts
commands.title: Search Products Documentation
commands.subtitle: Google Cloud Platform
commands.description: View the documentation of GCP Products.
